channel.title: Reference on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Reference on SoftLayer API

item.title: API Reference
item.description: In effort to extend SoftLayers dedication to automation to our customers and partners, we have provided this set of APIs to interact with all of our products. The APIs listed below will be your programmatic access point for integrate with your SoftLayer services. Our customer portal was built on top of the same API set we provide to our customers and is a great example of the tasks which can be performed.

item.title: SoftLayer ObjectStorage API
item.description: See Getting started with IBM CLoud Object Storage for more information about the current Object Storage offerings.
